title: Were American kids taught to conform in the 1950's? - Quora
tags: Education in the United States of America
Culture of the United States of America
History of the United States of America

response.answer_text: WE certainly were. Dancing school on Saturday, summer camp all summer, Brownies or Girl Scouts once a week, training with the Civil Air Patrol every weekend. But we got to see what the other girls were wearing, and we knew at least we weren’t “out of it.”

American kids were taught to conform in the 1950s. But then, American kids are taught to conform now. What they are taught to conform to has significantly changed and, perhaps there are even more acceptable options.
